page.title: 19SILVER JUBILEE WOOKEY HOLE
page.content: 1977 WAS THE YEAR THAT THE AREA CAME ALIVE AS A COMMUNITY. THE WOOKEY HOLE SILVER JUBILEE COMMITTEE, WHICH INCLUDED ENTHUSIASTIC "LOCALS" SUCH AS THE VILLAGE DOCTOR,HEADMASTER AND HEALTH INSPECTOR, WAS FORMED TO ARRANGE THE CELEBRATIONS. ONE EVENING THERE WAS A COMIC FOOTBALL MATCH, BETWEEN THE "MORTAR BOARD MARVELS" AND THE "WOOKEY HOLE WONDERS".THE NATIONAL GAME WAS NOTHING LIKE THIS; AN ASSORTED BUNCH, OF EITHER SEX, PLAYING OUTSIDE THE RULES! ON A MORE CULTURAL LEVEL A FASHION SHOW DELIGHTED THOSE INTERESTED IN THE LATEST STYLES AT PRICES UNAFFORDABLE. IN THE AFTERNOON OF THE "DAY" A CHILDREN'S FETE WAS HELD WITH A MARQUEE FOR TEAS. DURING THE EVENING THE JUBILEE SUPPER FOLLOWED BY DANCING WAS A FINALE TO A WONDERFUL WEEK .
